answers.answer: Ask your physician about reactive hypoglycemia and also consider getting tested for diabetes.

question: Can you help me? i am a 65 year old woman, and nowadays everytime after i eat or when i do something strenuous like walking to quickly etc. i feel very weak afterwards for a long time. especially on the inside of my wrist (where the thumb is) and by the shoulder - but no pain. Have you everheard of such a thing? Thank you very much for your time.Isak
title: Feeling weak after eating
